statements: DELETE FROM SeasonalAgriculturalProductivity WHERE year = 2021 AND crop_type = 'Wheat';
DELETE FROM SeasonalAgriculturalProductivity WHERE year = 2020 AND crop_type = 'Corn';
DELETE FROM Weather_Data WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Weather_Data WHERE location = 'New York' AND temperature > 80;
DELETE FROM Weather_Data WHERE temperature < 20 AND rainfall > 100
DELETE FROM productivity_analysis WHERE farmer_id = 3 AND crop_id = 2 AND productivity_score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM SeasonalTrends WHERE year = 2021 AND month = 'July';
DELETE FROM FarmManagement WHERE location = 'Farm A';
